name: Brown_Bonded_Leather_Double_Recliner_with_Table_Console
reviews: This recliner was damaged when received. One arm was bent so the recliner could not be closed on one side. I reported it to customer service at Overstock and got immediate feedback and the problem was resolved.

Not very difficult to assemble. I love the functionality. The center back converts to a table with cupholders which is very convenient on 'movie night'. There is also a large storage drawer under seat of middle section.
description:
Enjoy family night or entertain in style and comfort with this alluring leather recliner. The beautiful bonded leather upholstery offers a timeless appeal, while spacious seating and a padded headrest make this double recliner both functional and luxurious. A table console and drawer offer space for snacks and media storage.
